import React from'react';import"./demo.css";// Sample component to display class-wise textbook links
import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ShowDemo(){const classes=[{id:1,name:'Class 1',downloadLink:'./book/class1book.txt'},{id:2,name:'Class 2',downloadLink:'./book/class2book.txt'},{id:3,name:'Class 3',downloadLink:'./book/class3book.txt'},{id:4,name:'Class 4',downloadLink:'./book/class4book.txt'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"class-books-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Demo courses content are here :"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"demo-text",children:classes.map(cls=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[cls.name," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:cls.downloadLink,download:true,children:"Download Book"})]},cls.id))})]});}export default ShowDemo;
